name: Booky.io darker colors
description:
Booky.io now offers a dark theme, but it uses light gray instead of actual dark colors.
This theme replaces those colors with a darker palette.
additional_info:
v1.1.0 - 21/10/2020
--------------------------
Adapted the theme for the new layout.

v1.0.4 - 14/11/2019
--------------------------
Darkened the deletion select boxes.

v1.0.3 - 04/11/2019
--------------------------
Whitened the loading circle when adding a new bookmark.

v1.0.2 - 04/08/2019
--------------------------
Painted white the separator border when moving a link.

v1.0.1 - 15/07/2019
--------------------------
Painted dark some missing white buttons.

v1.0.0 - 12/07/2019
--------------------------
Released first version (only tested for desktop)
